about_the_game: A crucial fragment of the Heart of the Earth has been stolen. As a mechanized being re-engineered by its power, you are dispatched to the Moon Tower. Your mission: defeat all enemies, survive the perilous journey, and reclaim the lost fragment of the Heart of the Earth.
detailed_description: A crucial fragment of the Heart of the Earth has been stolen. As a mechanized being re-engineered by its power, you are dispatched to the Moon Tower. Your mission: defeat all enemies, survive the perilous journey, and reclaim the lost fragment of the Heart of the Earth.
name: MoonTower Demo

  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as a mechanical being, defeat all enemies, and retrieve the crucial item. Moon Tower is a fast-paced game where you must constantly dodge enemies and eliminate them within each room. Gain different abilities to strengthen yourself and enhance your power.
